issue.title: Consider adding Color and Time classes

content.raw:
The fact that ignition-math has so few dependencies is a good reason to put those types here, in my opinion. Rendering makes sense from a semantic viewpoint, but it will depend on ignition-math anyway, so I don't mind putting the Color classes here.

I haven't looked into `std::chrono` yet.
